DOC.criteria: Premenopausal female age 1855 year Sexually active ( least 1 heterosexual partner past 4 week ) Cases must difficulty orgasm anorgasmic Controls must normal sexual function Not sexually active Homosexual orientation Postmenopausal Stage > 2 pelvic organ prolapse ( POPQ measurement beyond hymen ) Urinary incontinence coitus limit sexual activity Severe vaginal atrophy Pelvic pain/dyspareunia ( Currently pregnant Depression treat SSRIs ( depression alone treatment depression nonSSRI medication exclusion ) Currently take testosterone supplement History sexual abuse Large pelvic mass ( benign cancerous ) impede MRI measurement grossly abnormal pelvic anatomy .
